ENGLISH: Your guards have found a strange man wandering within the borders of your realm. He is old and bearded, carries an odd staff and wears robes of deepest blue. He claims to be Pallando the Blue, one of the Blue Wizards, or Ithryn Luin, sent to Middle-Earth by the Valar. He has been known as Rómestámo, and his order is legendary. He asks for lodgings within your castle where he can rest, and in return he will offer his counsel to you.
ITALIAN: Alcune delle tue guardie, al ritorno da una ronda nelle terre intorno al tuo palazzo, hanno portato con loro uno strano individuo. È un vecchio avvolto da un vecchi mantello blu ed un bizzarro bastone. Egli dice di essere Pallando il Blu, anche conosciuto come Rómestámo, uno dei mitici Stregoni Blu, o Ithryn Luin. Ti chiede di offrirgli un luogo sicuro dove riposare e, in cambio, ti offrirà le sue conoscenze e servigi.

ENGLISH: Wise people will always be considered precious,you're welcome,Pallando the Blue.
ITALIAN: I saggi saranno sempre considerati utili qui, sei il benvenuto, Pallando il Blu.

ENGLISH: Don't bother me with such nonsense and expell this fool out of here!
ITALIAN: Non annoiatemi con simili fandonie e cacciate questo vecchio dal mio palazzo!

ENGLISH: Your guards have found a strange man wandering within the borders of your realm. He is old and bearded, carries an odd staff and wears robes of deepest blue. He claims to be Alatar the Blue, one of the Blue Wizards, or Ithryn Luin, sent to Middle-Earth by the Valar. He has been known as Morinehtar, and his order is legendary. He asks for lodgings within your castle where he can rest, and in return he will offer his counsel to you.
